relatedBlades.title: Leverage Zero Trust To Combat Multichannel Phishing Threats
relatedBlades.subtitle: What security leaders say about Zero Trust and new phishing threats
relatedBlades.copy:
__"Leverage Zero Trust to Combat Multichannel Phishing Threats,"__ a study conducted by Forrester Consulting commissioned by Cloudflare, explores the relevance of applying Zero Trust to defend against modern phishing threats. 

The global survey of 316 security decision-makers found that __while businesses are largely unprepared for phishing threats that span multiple channels__, platforms supporting Zero Trust approaches enable organizations to decrease risk and improve business continuity in the face of growing threats.

For example:

- __90%__ believe the scope of phishing threats is expanding â€” __4 out of 5__ have faced a multichannel attack in the last 12 months
- The majority (__59%__) have experienced phishing attacks in the last 12 months that have led to a significant-to-crippling impact on the business
- __89%__ believe that platforms that enable a Zero Trust approach are effective at preventing phishing threats

![Cloudflare OS_PNG - Expected Benefits](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/698MNVMKgt53yyD6PUAOlq/89d218c25d12dba6cfd5cd7f8bbef18e/Cloudflare_OS_PNG_6.png)
